title: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
description: Lightly used Sony WH-1000XM5 wireless noise-canceling headphones in black. Excellent sound quality, comes with original case and charging cable. Minor wear on ear cushions but fully functional.

title: Vintage Leather Jacket
description: A stylish vintage leather jacket, size medium, in brown. Gently worn with a classic distressed look. No tears, but some natural patina from use. Perfect for a retro vibe.

title: Mid-Century Modern Coffee Table
description: A mid-century modern coffee table made of walnut wood. In great condition with minor scratches on the surface, easily restorable. Adds a sleek, vintage touch to any living space.

title: Limited Edition Harry Potter Book Set
description: Complete set of Harry Potter hardcover books, first edition prints. In excellent condition, with only slight yellowing on page edges due to age. Dust jackets intact, a must-have for collectors.
